maintenance_mode.description: Whether the app is in maintenance mode. Show a maintenance screen when true.

force_update_enabled.description: Whether to force users to update. Blocks app usage until updated.

min_app_version.description: Minimum required app version (e.g., '1.2.0'). Used with force_update_enabled.

defaultValue.value: Please update to the latest version for the best experience.

update_message.description: Custom message for the update dialog shown to users.

update_url.description: URL to redirect users for app update (App Store/Play Store link).

new_feature_enabled.description: Whether a new feature is enabled for A/B testing or gradual rollout.

dark_mode_enabled.description: Whether dark mode is available to users.

push_notifications_enabled.description: Whether push notifications are enabled app-wide.

social_login_enabled.description: Whether social login (Google, Facebook, etc.) is enabled.

biometric_login_enabled.description: Whether biometric authentication (Face ID, Touch ID) is enabled.

api_version.description: API version being used (e.g., 'v1', 'v2'). Useful for A/B testing different API versions.

api_base_url.description: Base URL for API endpoints. Can change for staging/testing.

max_api_retries.description: Maximum number of times to retry failed API requests.

api_timeout_seconds.description: Timeout duration in seconds for API requests.

show_ads.description: Whether to show advertisements in the app.

show_promotion.description: Whether to show a promotional banner in the app.

promotion_message.description: Text content for the promotional banner.

promotion_url.description: URL to open when user taps on the promotional banner.

home_layout_variant.description: Variant for A/B testing different home screen layouts (e.g., 'classic', 'modern', 'minimal').

onboarding_variant.description: Variant for A/B testing different onboarding flows.

max_upload_size_mb.description: Maximum file size allowed for uploads in megabytes.

max_items_per_page.description: Maximum number of items to display per page for pagination.

max_search_results.description: Maximum number of search results to display.

free_tier_item_limit.description: Maximum items allowed for free tier users.

checkout_flow_variant.description: Variant for A/B testing different checkout flows.

pricing_variant.description: Variant for A/B testing different pricing strategies.

support_url.description: URL to support page or help center.

terms_of_service_url.description: URL to terms of service documentation.

cache_duration_minutes.description: Duration in minutes for how long to cache data locally.

offline_mode_enabled.description: Whether offline mode (using cached data) is enabled.
